description:
The fierce battle between Ichigo and Captain Byakuya rages on. Ichigo taunts Byakuya and demands that he use his bankai against him, while Byakuya remains visibly unmoved by Ichigo`s amazing display of power. Meanwhile, Uryu, Chad, Orihime, Ganju, and their new Soul Reaper friend, "Mini Mustache," are having trouble navigating through the Seireitei. Ichigo may be out of luck if he needs his friends to come to his aid this time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Décachetez ! La lame noire, la puissance miraculeuse
Kaihou! Kuroki Yaiba, Kiseki no Chikara
Open! The Black Blade, Power of a Miracle
開放! 黒き刃, 奇跡の力
